snippet: More than 30 people were hurt in the crush near the Godavari River in the southern state of Andhra Pradesh, according to health officials.
abstract: Stampede at Hindu festival in southern Indian state Andhra Pradesh kills at least 27 people.
lead_paragraph: More than 30 people were hurt in the crush near the Godavari River in the southern state of Andhra Pradesh, according to health officials.

headline.main: Indian Stampede Kills at Least 27 at Religious Festival
headline.print_headline: Stampede at Religious Festival in India Kills at Least 27
